title: I Can make friends
brief_description: Through following Zip and his talking dog Max as they meet their new neighbour Missy, children will learn how to make new friends and be better communicators. Areas covered include introducing themselves, beginning and ending a conversation, recognising the value of telling the truth, giving and receiving a compliment, sharing and apologising. Suitable for Mid-Upper Primary level students. Teachers guide included.
